contentrichtext.text: '''UFJ''', which stands for the '''United Financial of Japan''', is used in the former companies of [[UFJ Bank]], [[UFJ Group]], and [[UFJ Holdings]]. These related institutions disappeared after the merger of The Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi, and UFJ Bank in 2005. UFJ Bank itself was established by the merger in 2002 of the [[Sanwa Bank]], [[Tokai Bank]], and [[Toyo Trust and Banking]]. ==See also== * [[Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group]] * [[The Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi UFJ]] [[Category:Banks of Japan]] {{Japan-company-stub}}
